content: That's great information! I'll definitely look into those bike shops and tour operators. I'm particularly interested in joining a guided tour in Jackson Hole to explore some of the more challenging mountain bike trails. By the way, do you think I'll need to make any adjustments to my road bike to prepare it for the long trip? I've already got a new bike computer and have been tracking my progress on Strava, but I'm not sure if I need to do anything else to get my road bike ready.
